name: A:MExchange
tagline: Freely organize and manage your animation:master resources
body:
### Welcome to A:MExchange on GitHub.
Here you will find a collection of resources for the Animation:Master community.

### Share and perfect community resources
The purpose of this site is two-fold.  Firstly, resource are shared in an easy and accessible way.  Secondly, shared  resources are refined based on requests.  For example, a character might be modeled with a basic rig/skeleton included but a request to have the character updated to include the 2001, Squetch Rig or another rig provided may be submitted.  Every detail of the model and rig can then be refined until the issue at hand is resolved and the request closed.

### Authors and Contributors
You can @mention a GitHub username to generate a link to their profile. The resulting `<a>` element will link to the contributorâ€™s GitHub Profile. For example: In 2007, Chris Wanstrath (@defunkt), PJ Hyett (@pjhyett), and Tom Preston-Werner (@mojombo) founded GitHub.

### Support or Contact
For specific issues with GitHub see Github [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact).  For help with this repository please open an Issue and describe your issue.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
